text: Hianagi zamagri'ma zamagu'vazino zamavaresia ne'mo'a hankavenentake hu'neankino, Monafi sondia vahe'mofo Ra Anumzane huno agia me'ne. Ana hu'neankino tamagerfa huno Agra zamaza huno hara huno nezamanteno, maka ama mopafi vahera mani frua zamigahie. Hianagi Babiloni vahera zamatresigeno nomaniza zamimo'a haviza hanige'za mani so'ea osugahaze.
